top_comments.comment: So it’s OK for a woman to exhibit masculinity and become butch more craziness and men always had the role of a hunter gatherer or is that part of history they want to remove!
women are equal they can help themselves now in 2021

A Christless society can only give you unrestrained hate and thuggery. 

Mothers are the first line of defense, especially in single parent families and when they fail their moral duty, others down the path of their children, will suffer the consequences, with or from those children. 

Our society is expressing the lostness of its spiritual soul and is right back where Christ said it would lead in the last of the last days, "as in the days of Noah," where violence filled the earth.

If you think what Laura shared was repugnant, then you will be shocked just how more hideous the world is going to get.  Everyone who understands what is unfolding, should be preparing themselves for the worse case scenario and your children need to be brought up to speed as to what is obviously coming their way.

Women, need to accept the fact that they are not living in a safe society and that they need to conduct their affairs in a proactive, defensive posture. 

Almost every misery facing the world, has democrat fingerprints on the evidence and people are still supporting them, because they think there's something free to be had, if they do.
We left the cities and corporations. We are being pushed out of society. My son will be raises to be strong without city school influences
This is the result of ---> THE FEMINIST going to FAR

This is a case of too much time on your hands people need to mind their own business and stay in their Lane my cousin intervened with a couple arguing where the man struck the woman several times with a closed fist my cousin asked the man to take it easy the man pulled out a 9 mm shot him and killed him at a Walmart Christmas Eve with his wife inside buying a dress she comes out to my cousin dead the punk that killed my cousin 25 years old sad excuse for a man now he's in the state prison with taxpayers footing the bill that's the business America is in housing inmates privatized jails humans all over the world are going to get a wake-up call and realize what is important
women are equal they can help themselves now in 2021

What is going on now, I would blame the educational system… why?
Several occasions, I have heard the report regarding a situation… of which if a person appears to be showing themselves as an idiot, no one steps into the situation so as to help… but what they do is… post it on the internet?  So as to make light and humor of someone’s error.
So where has compassion disappeared to?  It like the educational system is teaching the newer generation to ‘show no concern’ -except for yourself!  Focus on your own needs, others are questionable… don’t trust the strangers… because you never know if they are an enemy!
So is love, kindness, compassion but as characteristic of the past?  Do these have any value?  Or are they just old-fashioned elements of history which are become ‘archaic’.
But then observe how democrats are handling issues… I think it’s near time for a different nature of intervention.

0:22 correlation =\= causation
In this case it’s the other way around.
